attributes.action: 'Corruption' as an alternative to Public Funding for Political Parties is not acceptable
attributes.additional_details: Following the latest 'Cash for Access' scandal, we once again hear the lame " this sort of thing wouldn't happen if Parties received Public Funding' In other words - "Pay for our Party Political Media Circus or we WILL fiddle our expenses, take payments for access to Ministers etc, etc". This is not acceptable! We ask that all Parties remain self-funding AND that existing Regulations./ Laws are now STRICTLY enforced.
